duties_responsibilities.duty: Supporting the entire construction project lifecycle from pre- to post-construction, including collaborating with project manager and superintendent.
Contributing to estimating efforts, coordinating sub bids, and materials pricing.
Maintaining positive relationships and clear communication with clients, partners, designers, field team, and subcontractors.
Reading and managing plans, specifications, contracts, purchase orders, shop drawings, and all other project related documents.
Issuing RFPs, distributing plans and contract documents, creating scope of work for subs and vendors, and conducting subcontractor site walk-throughs.
Assessing data from subcontractor proposals, negotiating and summarizing, writing and managing Subcontractor Agreements.
Maintaining punch list with architect and build team, receiving, reviewing, and coding applications for payment with project manager.
Maintaining owner’s manual and handling project close out requirements, working with superintendent to maintain job site quality control, and advocating for safety in action and attitude.

education_certification.credential: Construction Management degree, or similar education plus experience.
